formatName: Verity Collection Index Pending Transaction File
formatDescription: A Verity collection is the fundamental structure underlying the search capabilities of Verity applications. A collection consists of information about a particular set of documents that are available for searching and viewing. The specific information stored for a collection includes a word index and various other indexes, plus a document table containing document field information and logical pointers to the document files. The Verity Collection Index Pending Transaction Files store information on pending indexing transactions.
provenanceCompoundName: Digital Preservation Department / The National Archives

internalSignatures.name: Verity Collection Index Pending Transaction File
